name: cross-platform-template
description: A minimal template for cross-platform PERN stack applications

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:mobile"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:mobile
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../mobile && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:env && npm run setup:db
scripts.setup:env: cp backend/.env.example backend/.env && cp frontend/.env.example frontend/.env && cp mobile/.env.example mobile/.env
scripts.setup:db: cd backend && npm run migrate && npm run seed
